movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

movies.title: The Godfather Part II
movies.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
